choose.when: WHERE (member_id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') AND category_id = TO_NUMBER(${categoryId})

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM post WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (post_id, title, write_time, category_id,content, member_id) VALUES(seq_post.nextval, #{title}, sysdate, #{categoryId}, #{content}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, comment_contents, post_id , parent_comment_id, comment_id FROM comments WHERE post_id = #{postId} START WITH parent_comment_id IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR comment_id = parent_comment_id

SELECT comment_id, member_id, board_id, category_id, post_id, COMMENT_CONTENTS, board_name, category_name, name FROM (SELECT rownum rm, comment_id, board_id, category_id, member_id, post_id, COMMENT_CONTENTS, board_name, category_name, name FROM (SELECT cmt.comment_id, cmt.member_id, b.board_id, c.category_id, cmt.post_id, cmt.COMMENT_CONTENTS, b.board_name, c.category_name, m.name FROM comments cmt JOIN member_data m on cmt.member_id = m.id JOIN post p on cmt.post_id = p.post_id JOIN category c on p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN board b on c.board_id = b.board_id ORDER BY comment_id DESC)) WHERE rm between #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT post_id, board_id, title, content, view_cnt, board_name, category_name, name FROM (SELECT rownum rm, post_id, b.board_id, title, content, view_cnt, b.board_name, c.category_name, m.name FROM post p JOIN category c on p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN member_data m on p.member_id = m.id JOIN board b on b.board_id = c.board_id ORDER BY post_id DESC) WHERE rm between #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT rownum rm, post_id, title, content, view_cnt, b.board_name, c.category_name, m.name, c.category_id FROM post p JOIN category c on p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN member_data m on p.member_id = m.id JOIN board b on b.board_id = c.board_id) WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}

SELECT post_id, board_id, title, content, view_cnt, board_name, category_name, name FROM (SELECT rownum rm, post_id, b.board_id, title, content, view_cnt, b.board_name, c.category_name, m.name FROM post p JOIN category c on p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN member_data m on p.member_id = m.id JOIN board b on b.board_id = c.board_id WHERE p.category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY post_id DESC) WHERE rm between #{pageDto.start} AND #{pageDto.end}
